title: E-Commerce Redesign
description: A complete overhaul of the checkout flow to improve conversion rates.

problemStatement.context: The legacy system was suffering from high cart abandonment rates due to a complex checkout process.
problemStatement.constraints: Strict 3-month deadline, legacy backend integration required.

research.summary: Conducted 15 user interviews and analyzed 50+ hours of session recordings.
insights: Users couldn't find the guest checkout option.
Checkout form validation was too aggressive.

outcomes.reflection: I learned the importance of early user testing to validate assumptions about form complexity.

title: Health Tracker App
description: Mobile application for tracking daily fitness and nutrition goals.

problemStatement.context: Users found existing apps too cluttered and difficult to log data quickly.
goals: Simplify data entry to under 30 seconds

research.summary: Surveyed 200 potential users about their fitness tracking habits.
insights: Auto-logging via wearables is a must-have.

outcomes.reflection: Simplification is key for mobile utilities. Less is more.
